weapon.name: Chakram of the Seas
weapon.description: A round and sharp weapon that traveled the seas with its owner.

normals.name: Rapid Throw
normals.description:
While on the ground, brandish the chakram to unleash **5** spinning attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **35.3%** of ATK plus **212**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **27.4%** of ATK plus **164**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **39.1%** of ATK plus **235**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **35.3%** of ATK plus **212**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **61.9%** of ATK plus **371** and knock the target back a short distance.

normals.name: Aerial Discharge
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to unleash **3** spinning attacks in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **30.1%** of ATK plus **181**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **33.6%** of ATK plus **201**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **42.8%** of ATK plus **256**.

normals.name: Scatter
normals.description:
After the second normal attack, hold attack button to activate Scatter.
Fire five penetrating chakrams forward, each hit dealing **50%** of ATK plus **300** damage, with minor knockback.

normals.name: Air Spin
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Air Spin.
Unleash a powerful strike, dealing damage equal to **220.2%** of ATK plus **1321** to the target and nearby enemies, and suspend them.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **491.6%** of ATK plus **2950**.

dodge.name: Waning Moon
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Waning Moon.
Toss a spinning chakram forward, dealing damage equal to **152.8%** of ATK plus **917** to the target and inflicting a **stun** effect for **0.5** seconds. The chakram then splits into **3** and keeps traveling, dealing damage equal to **27.8%** of ATK plus **167** to targets along their path. **Split chakrams will bounce during Full Bloom**.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Full Bloom
skill.description: Create a Chakram Domain with the Wanderer at the center for **8** seconds. At the same time, enemies are pulled in, and their speed is reduced by **30%** for **8** seconds. Fire **5** chakrams that bounce between enemies, dealing damage equal to **27.8%** of ATK plus **167** to targets along their paths, bouncing up to **5** times. **The split chakrams triggered by Waning Moon will also bounce up to **5** times.** Cooldown: **45** seconds.

discharge.name: Spirit of the Air
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and unleash Chakram of the Seas at a target. Struck target causes AoE **stun** for **1** second, plus **1** attack each against up to **3** units every second (each attack has **10%** chance of **stunning** the target for **1.5** seconds), dealing **49.7%** x ATK plus **298** damage for **10** seconds.

advancements.description: Increase damage dealt to and all elemental shattering effects on targets within **Full Bloom**'s range by **30%**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Increase shatter by **15%** and reset all weapon skill cooldowns upon shattering the target's shield. Can only be triggered once every **30** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.
Attacking a grievous target extends the duration of grievous by an additional **7** seconds (only takes effect once for the same effect).
After using **Full Bloom**, grant a **100%** crit chance for the next **8** seconds.

matrice.name: Shiro
matrice.description: Like a wild cat, she is skittish toward others. Yet sometimes she'll sit by a pond and play with the water, wondering why she is so lonely.

set.set_2: Increase both damage and shatter to targets with more than **50%** HP by **15%**/**19%**/**22.5%**/**26%**.
set.set_4: Upon entering battle, gain a **20%**/**25%**/**30%**/**35%** damage boost for **35** seconds. Reset **5** seconds after exiting battle.
